song_lyrics: Suṇ sāhelī, Sahajānand sangāthe māre prītaḍī;
Te to nav chhūṭe, antarmāhe alaukik evī ṭev paḍī... °ṭek
Hu to ḍarapu nahi have koī bhāgī, me to lok lāj sarve tyāgī;
Mārī laganī e sāthe lāgī... Suṇ° 1
Mane ghar dhandho dīṭho na game, māru manḍu to te pās bhame;
Me to samajī kīdhu achaḷ sahī, bahu kūṭī thākyā lok kahī;
Have to shir sāṭānī vāt thaī... Suṇ° 3
Sahu visāryu tan dhan kuṭumb sagun, ethī adhakṣhaṇ man na rahe aḷagu;
Brahmānand kahe māru man vaḷagyu... Suṇ° 4
title: Suṇ sāhelī Sahajānand sangāthe māre prītaḍī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-612: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
